Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: charly
Reviews.Content: I love this camera and the kit has everything I need in it.. its a good price for what u get

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 12 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D5200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Red) + <2> Nikon 55-200mm VR DX AF-S Lens + <3> Transcend 32GB Class10 SD Card +
<4> Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter + <5> Additional Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter + <6> ML-L3 Shutter Remote Control +
<7> PD Digital SLR Camera Case + <8> Precision Design 58" Tripod + <9> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader +
<10> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <11> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <12> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D5200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Red) with 55-200mm VR Lens + 32GB Card + Case + Filters + Remote + Tripod + Accessory Kit
